org.digijava.kernel.translator.util

Interface TranslationCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountryCallBackHandler, HowDidYouHearCallback, InterestsCallback, SiteCallback

    public interface TranslationCallback
    Callback interface which must be passed to TrnUtil.sortByTranslation() method

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDefaultTranslation(java.lang.Object o)
      Returns the default translation for the given object.
      java.lang.String getSiteId(java.lang.Object o)
      Returns "string" identity of the site (returned by Site.getSiteId() method) for which translation must be found.
      java.lang.String getTranslationKey(java.lang.Object o)
      Returns translation key for the given object.

    • Method Detail

      • getSiteId

        java.lang.String getSiteId(java.lang.Object o)
        Returns "string" identity of the site (returned by Site.getSiteId() method) for which translation must be found. For global translations, this method must return '0'
        Parameters:
        o - Object for which callback is called
        Returns:
        Return "string" identity of the site for which translation must be found

      • getTranslationKey

        java.lang.String getTranslationKey(java.lang.Object o)
        Returns translation key for the given object. For sites it will be "site:" + siteId (for example: "site:dglogin")
        Parameters:
        o - Object for which callback is called

      • getDefaultTranslation

        java.lang.String getDefaultTranslation(java.lang.Object o)
        Returns the default translation for the given object. This value is important if the object does not have translation for the target locale.
        Parameters:
        o - Object for which callback is called
        Returns:
        the default translation for the given object
